1.title: The Good Place
1.plot: The cast and creators of NBC's "The Good Place" talk with Anthony Carboni about their characters and the unusual concept.

2.title: Vikings Interactive Booth
2.plot: Rob and Rich head inside the interactive History Channel's "Vikings" booth to conquer their fears.

3.title: Dirk Gently Cast
3.plot: The cast and crew of BBC America's "Dirk Gently" joins Carrie on the CCHQ balcony for some info on the new kind of detective story series.

4.title: Time After Time
4.plot: ABC's "Time After Time" brings HG Wells and his time machine to modern day New York City. The cast and creator fill us in on the adventures to come this season.

5.title: CCHQ Live 2016-Aliens 30th Anniversary
5.plot: The biggest reunion at this year's con; the entire cast and crew of Aliens celebrates the 30th anniversary in Hall H and reminisces on the press line.

6.title: Ash Vs. Evil Dead Experience
6.plot: Trisha heads inside the "Ash vs. Evil Dead" interactive haunted cabin to get the full Evil Dead experience.

7.title: Adult Swim Carnival
7.plot: Anthony spends some at the Adult Swim Carnival testing his luck.

8.title: WWE and Scooby Doo
8.plot: "Scooby Doo" has some new friends from the WWE helping them on a new mystery.

9.title: Son of Zorn Activation
9.plot: Rob and Rich visit Fox's "Son of Zorn" for some hawk riding, rock wall climing and base jumping fun.

10.title: NECA Toys
10.plot: Anthony visits the NECA booth to get a look at this year's exclusives collectibles.

11.title: Square Enix
11.plot: Malik hits the Square Enix booth to experience their upcoming properties.

12.title: Star Trek Discovery
12.plot: Josh Macuga talks with the producers of the new "Star Trek Discovery" about the premise of the new series and if there will be Hannibal?

13.title: X-Men Experience
13.plot: Rob and Rich visit the X-Men Apocalypse escape room right on the con floor.

14.title: Elvira
14.plot: Trisha talks to Elvira about her new photo book of 35 years worth of Elvira.

15.title: Marvel Press Room
15.plot: One of the biggest events in Hall H; Marvel Cinematic Universe brings out the stars from all the upcoming franchises.

16.title: Bandai Power Rangers
16.plot: Bandai reveals the first set of figures from the new "Power Rangers" film and some exclusive only available at the con.

17.title: Arrow
17.plot: Malik talks with the cast of "Arrow" about how they make super heroes work on a smaller screen.

18.title: Why Are You In Line?
18.plot: Rob and Rich check in with the mega fans of Comic-Con that spend hours and days waiting to see something special and ask them; Why Are You In Line?

20.title: Prison Break
20.plot: The cast "Prison Break" reunites for a season 5 and fills us in on what has changed in the past seven years.

21.title: Skybound Booth
21.plot: Anthony visits the Skybound booth to check out the exclusive items for some of the current popular books including "The Walking Dead", "Saga" and "Outcast."

23.title: Once upon a Time
23.plot: The cast and creators of ABC's "Once Upon A Time" talk about playing with beloved characters and building on their stories.

24.title: Shadow hunters
24.plot: Isaiah Mustafa from the cast of "Shadowhunters" join Allison and Steve to talk about being a nerd, aspiring to become a super hero and the Mortal Instruments series.

25.title: Echo Kellum
25.plot: Echo Kellum from the cast of "Arrow" talks about his con experience and a surprise musical performance during their panel.

26.title: Kings of Con
26.plot: Rob and Rich take time out of the their busy correspondent schedule to sit down and talk about their new CCHQ series; "Kings of Con" based on their experiences at "Supernatural" conventions.

27.title: Spiderman
27.plot: Tony Revelori and Jacob Batalon from the cast of "Spiderman: Homecoming" tease the movie and discuss the beginning of filming.

28.title: Her Universe
28.plot: Her Universe executives, Ashley Eckstein and Jennifer Tisdale talk about their new series available exclusively on Comic-Con HQ and the fashion show this year.

29.title: DC all Access
29.plot: Host of DC All Access, Jason Inman joins Steve to talk about this year's con, Wonder Woman's awesomeness and everything DC.

30.title: Katie Cook
30.plot: "My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic" writer, Katie Cook visits the CCHQ Live stage to talk about Gronk and her new children's "Star Wars" book.

1.title: Greg Grunberg
1.plot: One of only three people who are a part of both "Star Trek" and "Star Wars"; Greg Grunberg gives us the info on his new graphic novel, Dream Jumper, his series with Kevin Smith; "Geeking Out", and the perks of being life-long friends with J.J. Abrams.

2.title: Battlebots
2.plot: Allison Haislip talks to the cast and crew of ABC's "Battlebots" about the chaos of flying shrapnel and how the judges make the tough decisions.

3.title: Blake Neely
3.plot: Composer Blake Neely ("The Flash", "Arrow", "Blindspot", "Supergirl") talks to Allison and Steve about composing for characters you love and what cosplay he looks forward to seeing at this year's con.

4.title: Doug Jones
4.plot: The man that has played some of the most beloved and creepy movie monsters, Doug Jones talks about "Pan's Labyrinth's" 10th anniversary edition, cosplaying without a costume, and his upcoming film, "The Bye Bye Man".

5.title: Fede Alvarez
5.plot: Fede Alvarez discusses what horror aficionados can expect from his new film, "Don't Breathe" and why it's not just another ghost story.

6.title: Jim Lee and Dan DiDio
6.plot: Co-publishers of DC Comics; Jim Lee and Dan DiDio talk about their strangest experiences at the con, secret sketch giveaways with Jim Lee and creative contributions to Rebirth.

7.title: John Bradley-West
7.plot: John Bradley-West (Samwell Tarly from "Game of Thrones") talks about playing the nice guy, who he thinks ends up on the throne and his new film, "Traders".

8.title: Junkie XL
8.plot: Composer Junkie XL talks to Allison Haislip about making electronic music and working on films featuring iconic comic book characters.

9.title: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
9.plot: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar brings Sherlock's brother to the comic world with Mycroft Holmes and talks about his love for comic books as a child.

10.title: Lights Out Cast
10.plot: The cast of "Lights Out" talks about the drama and family story that comes along with this creepy horror film and the on set pranks that haunted the set.

11.title: Mark Altman
11.plot: Writer of The Fifty-Year Mission: The Complete, Uncensored, Unauthorized Oral History of Star Trek: Volume One: The First 25 Years, Mark Altman discusses his love for the franchise and the inspiration it brings.

12.title: Max Landis
12.plot: Max Landis discusses his new series; "Dirk Gently" and comic Green Valley which is based on a story he made up as a child.

13.title: Nerve Cast
13.plot: "Nerve" cast members Emma Roberts and Dave Franco talk with Allison and Steve about being a watcher and a player and things to get excited about at Comic-Con.

14.title: Nichelle Nichols
14.plot: Living "Star Trek" legend Nichelle Nichols discusses the phenomenon of the franchise, her iconic role of Lt. Nyota Uhura and being recruited by NASA.

15.title: Paul Dini
15.plot: Harley Quinn creator, Paul Dini joins fan-girl Allison Haislip to discuss the evolution of the character and what she will bring to "Suicide Squad".

16.title: Power Rangers Cast
16.plot: The cast and director of the new "Power Rangers" film talk about expanding on the franchise, stunt choreography and real life injuries.

17.title: Scott McCloud
17.plot: "Comic Theorist" and Eisner Award winner Scott McCloud discusses his love for visual communication and his graphic novels.

18.title: Van Helsing Cast
18.plot: "Van Helsing" series cast members talk about delving into the post-apocalyptic world of vampires and working with Neil LaBute.

19.title: Violett Beane
19.plot: "The Flash" cast member Violett Beane discusses next season of the series and the possibility of putting on tights and transitioning to Jesse Quick.

20.title: Introduction
20.plot: Welcome to San Diego Comic-Con 2016 and the Comic-Con HQ live coverage. We will be bringing you interviews, clips, panels and more over the next 4 days. So strap in and get comfortable for 20 hours of non-stop fun.

21.title: Stan Lee
21.plot: A super hero who can conjure creative and has changed entertainment of every medium, Stan Lee stand in a field of his own.

23.title: Wonder Woman
23.plot: Founding member of the Justice League, Wonder Woman has been an inspiration for strength, beauty and feminism. This legend has only become more popular over the years and now finally getting her own film.

24.title: Star Trek Beyond Premiere
24.plot: CCHQ's Film HQ correspondent's talk with the director and stars of "Star Trek Beyond" at the world premiere during Preview Night of Comic-Con 2016.

26.title: Malik and Jedi Master Batman
26.plot: Malik Forte is roaming the floor of the con and meets a Jedi Master Batman cosplayer.

27.title: Marvel Booth
27.plot: Mike Pasciullo of Marvel talks about the 75th anniversary of Captain America and Divided We Stand.

28.title: Presenters
28.plot: Meet the Comic-Con HQ bringing you all the action, interviews, cosplayers and collectibles to be seen at this year's Comic-Con.

29.title: Malik, Dr. Strange and Poison Ivy
29.plot: Malik talks to a Dr.Stranger and Poison Ivy cosplayers and asks them about their joy and love for the con.

32.title: Side show Collectible
32.plot: Trisha visits one of the coolest booths on the floor and gets a look at The Court of the Dead.

33.title: Dustin Nguyen
33.plot: Comic book artist Dustin Nguyen talks about Descender, working with water color and finding his way in the comic world.

34.title: American Gods Booth
34.plot: Anthony Carboni visits the "American Gods" booth on the floor and has an exclusive conversation with a furry friend.

35.title: DC Comics Booth
35.plot: Malik visits the DC booth on the floor to get the scoop on Rebirth and see what it's like to be Batman through VR.

36.title: Baby Wonder Woman
36.plot: Trisha meets the smallest Wonder Woman cosplayers and finds out what the character means to the fans.

37.title: Amazon Experience
37.plot: Adam Sessler visits the Amazon experience with costume pieces from "The Man in the High Castle" and speaks to the voices of "Thunderbirds are GO".

38.title: Trolls
38.plot: Carrie Keagan joins the directors and producer of "Trolls" to talk about the party going on inside of the trolls.

39.title: Capcom Booth
39.plot: Malik heads to the Capcom booth to get the VR Resident Evil experience and learn whats next for Street Fighter, Dead Rising and more.

40.title: Dark Horse Comics
40.plot: Dark Horse Comics has comic books, collectibles and more. Anthony Carboni visits the booth to get a look at the just released cover of "Hellboy" and an exclusive Halo banshee.

1.title: Image Comics Booth
1.plot: Image Comics has all the hot comics including Monstress, The Walking Dead and Blue Monday but we also get the scoop on some cool underrated books like The Humans.

2.title: Dr. Strange Costumes
2.plot: Anthony Carboni gets up close and person with the costumes from "Dr. Strange."

3.title: Graphic Lab Tees
3.plot: Go shopping for some fun and punny Comic-Con swag with Anthony Carboni.

4.title: What Wonder Woman Means to You
4.plot: In honor of Wonder Woman's 75th anniversary, Trisha hears from the fans about WW's influence.

5.title: Artists' Alley Patrick Ballesteros
5.plot: Patrick talks to Malik about creating content using childhood nostalgia and his exclusive pieces just for this year's con.

6.title: Snowden
6.plot: The cast of "Snowden" shares their thoughts on the dramatization of this real life story and the perceived ideas of what kind of person Edward Snowden actually is.

7.title: Gears of War
7.plot: Gears of War co-creator Rod Fergusson explains the heart of a Gears of War and re-creating this groundbreaking game.

8.title: Neil Degrasse Tyson Presents Space Odyssey
8.plot: Build and Explore solar systems in this new VR game with Neil deGrass Tyson.

9.title: Mr. Robot Cast Interviews
9.plot: Carrie Keagan hits the press line to chat with Mr.Robot cast about how their series has become so beloved by the fans.

10.title: Mac Star Trek
10.plot: Trisha hits the MAC booth to get a "Star Trek" inspired makeover.

11.title: Entertainment Earth
11.plot: "Entertainment Earth celebrates their 20th year at Comic-Con with even more exclusives including a Batman covered in graffiti by the Joker."

12.title: Wonder Woman Archives
12.plot: Warner Bros. brings some amazing pieces to the floor for Wonder Woman's 75th anniversary including Lynda Carter's costume.

13.title: Hasbro Booth
13.plot: Hasbro brings Marvel Legends to life with their amazing displays and collectors' box sets.

14.title: Nickelodeon Experience
14.plot: The 90's are back with The Splat and a live version of Double Dare right here at Comic-Con.

15.title: Batman vs Superman Batmobile
15.plot: Malik gets every Batman fans' dream come true by experiencing the bat-mobile in first person.

16.title: Konami
16.plot: Adam Sessler gets his own Yu-Gi-Oh playing card and visits the Konami booth where anyone can play with masters of the game.

17.title: Suicide Squad
17.plot: Adam Sessler visits the Suicide Squad activation and gets to make a t-shirt, get a tattoo and experience the VR game that will be released the same day as the film, August 5th.

18.title: Day 2 Welcome
18.plot: CCHQ's correspondents are back on day 2 of Comic-Con to bring you even more excitement and cosplay.

19.title: Teen Wolf
19.plot: The cast of Teen Wolf joins Carrie on the balcony to talk about the announcement of the last season of the series.

20.title: Star Wars Collectibles
20.plot: Adam visits the Prop Shop booth to see how real "Star Wars" props make it from film to pieces that fans can buy and own.

21.title: CCHQ Live 2016- La-La Land Records
21.plot: La-La Land Records has music from every series and film you could imagine. This weekend at Comic-Con you can get the theme song to Wonder Woman on picture disk.

22.title: CCHQ Live 2016- What Star Trek Means to you
22.plot: Con "Star Trek" fans tell Anthony what the franchise means to them.

23.title: CCHQ Live 2016- Valerian
23.plot: The cast of "Valerian and the City of Thousand Planets" talks to Carrie about the influence about the comic on the sci-fi world.

25.title: CCHQ Live 2016- Call of Duty
25.plot: Malik talks with the voice actors and director of Call of Duty: Inifinite Warfare about game announcements and voice acting in zero gravity.

26.title: CCHQ Live 2016- Ash vs Evil Dead
26.plot: Bruce Campbell talks about the upcoming season of "Ash vs. Evil Dead" and the ban on the red band trailer.

30.title: CCHQ Live 2016- Trisha at Pendragon Costumes
30.plot: Ever wanted to get your hands on some con threads that don't come in t-shirt form? Trisha shows off her own threads and ones just like it make for the fan who wants a little more stylish look.

31.title: Artists' Alley Dawn McTeigue
31.plot: Comic artist Dawn McTeigue explains how she was inspired by Gen13 and bringing her artistry to life.

32.title: UCC Booth
32.plot: UCC gives Trisha a look at all this year's exclusives including Shopkins shoppies, DC and Marvel weebles and a "Deadpool" potato head.

33.title: NBC Activation
33.plot: Malik gets the full experience of NBC's upcoming new series.

34.title: Adam and Public Enemy
34.plot: Based on Hip Hop Family Tree, Adam buys the last thing he will ever need.

35.title: Disney Music Emporium
35.plot: Disney Music Emporium has music available on vinyl from new and old films and series, available at Comic-Con and online.

36.title: Nerve Directors
36.plot: The directors of "Nerve" talk about creating a concept that forces them to predict the future of technology to keep up with the time we currently live in.

37.title: DC Booth
37.plot: CCHQ gets a look at a bombshell contest within the DC Booth, updates on the DC Comics Bombshells annual and the addition of Vixen.

38.title: Cosplay at the Con
38.plot: Trisha hits the con to check out all the amazing cosplay characters, their thoughts on the surge of cosplayers in recent years.

39.title: David Glanzer
39.plot: Chief Communication and Strategy Officer David Glanzer spends some time with Allison and Steve talking about getting in new excited fans every year and the fun surprises appearances.

40.title: Skybound
40.plot: Brandon Thomas and Shawn Martinbrough discuss some of Skybound's IP's such as Thief of Thieves, Horizon, and of course; The Walking Dead.

41.title: Joyride
41.plot: Authors of Batman and Robin Eternal talk about how they got into comics and their new project, Joyride.

42.title: Wynonna Earp
42.plot: Creator Beau Smith and the cast of "Wynonna Earp" discuss re-inventing the Wyatt Earp story and acting with CGI.

43.title: Comic-Con Insiders
43.plot: The Comic-Con HQ Insiders talk with Steve about what they're working on, their thoughts on the con's breaking news and working in the fandom industry.

44.title: Dark Matter
44.plot: The cast of "Dark Matter" talk about who their characters are and enjoying the fans embrace their series.

45.title: Halo Wars 2
45.plot: Dan Ayoub and Kevin Grace discuss Halo Wars 2 and the possibility of bringing Halo in the VR world.

46.title: Orphan Black
46.plot: The cast and creators of "Orphan Black" discuss their experiences at Comic-Con and what characters they have seen cosplayed from their show.

47.title: WWE Superstars
47.plot: WWE Superstars talk about being at the con for the first time, talking with fans at a panel and becoming an action figure.

48.title: IMDb Triva
48.plot: Brian Haberlin shows off his book, Anomaly; the longest graphic novel ever and does some trivia with Josh.

49.title: Wonder Woman Artists and Writers
49.plot: Writers and artists from Wonder Woman "77" talk about the icon that is Wonder Woman and their long history of attending the con.

50.title: Comic-Con Insiders 2
50.plot: Comic-Con HQ Insiders discuss big events at the con and everything that is worth the wait.

51.title: First Look
51.plot: Exclusive first look at season 2 of "Con Man" and all its guest stars.

52.title: Reddit IRL
52.plot: Reddit is part of this year's CCHQ Experience at Comic-Con. Will shows us the giveaways and asks fans to answer an age old question.

53.title: Thought Bubble Comic Art Festival
53.plot: Tula Lotay introduces us to the Thought Bubble Festival in the UK, a comic fest based around the writers and artists.

54.title: John Barrowman
54.plot: 2016 Eisner Awards host, John Barrowman join Steve on stage to talk about the show and con hosting experiences.

55.title: Comic Con Insiders 3
55.plot: Steve talks with another group of our CCHQ insiders about streaming content, binge watching and how its changed the landscape of the con.

56.title: Dead Rising 4
56.plot: Fortune City has been overrun by zombies. The creators of Dead Rising 4 chat with Steve about the next evolution of Dead Rising.

57.title: Bear McCreary
57.plot: Composer of some of today's favorite series, Bear McCreary speaks about working on the shows and when a piece of music comes together.

58.title: Harg Nallin Sclopio Peepio
58.plot: The show the internet referred to as, "hallucinatory gumbo"; the creators of Harg Nallin' Sclopio Peepio give us the lowdown on their show maybe giving people seizures.

59.title: Cliffy B
59.plot: Cliffy B talks about starting out as a gamer and reviewing and turning it into a career and now producer his own games.

60.title: Robot Chicken and Super Mansion
60.plot: The creative team and voice actors for Adult Swim's popular series discuss toy collecting and working with Brian Cranston.

61.title: Batman The Killing Joke
61.plot: The cast and crew of "The Killing Joke" talk about the fan base for the story and how the R rated animated film came together with some of the original voice actors.

62.title: IMDb Trivia 2
62.plot: Josh Macuga tests some of the con's cosplayers movie trivia skills.

63.title: Sharknado 4
63.plot: The cast and director of "Sharknado 4" talk about the popularity of the franchise.

64.title: What's News? Hosts
64.plot: The hosts of CCHQ's series, What's News? fills us in on what is going on in the fandom world.

65.title: The Expanse
65.plot: Space opera, political thriller, sci-fi. "The Expanse" has a little something for everyone.

1.title: Con Man
1.plot: The cast of Con Man fills us in on how the show came to be, what is coming up for the show and reveals an exclusive look at season 2.

2.title: Game of Thrones
2.plot: Isaac Hemptead Wright and Liam Cunningham from "Game of Thrones" join Allison and Steve to discuss making the most popular series on television and being fans themselves.

3.title: Outcast
3.plot: The cast of "Outcast" including creator Robert Kirkman discuss living in the world of the horror genre and having a series on a network that lets the show be what it needs to.

4.title: Dirk Gently
4.plot: The executive producer and mind behind "Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy" catches CCHQ up on what is to come with "Dirk Gently: Holistic Detective."

5.title: Mystery Science Theatre
5.plot: Brought back from the land of cancellation more than twice, MSTK introduces the cast and talks about why a series about making fun of movies is fun for everyone.

6.title: Charlie Adlard
6.plot: "The Walking Dead" artist Charlie Adlard joins Allison and Steve and talks about some of the other comics you should know that he illustrates including White Death.

7.title: Roger Craig Smith
7.plot: The Man of a million voices, Roger Craigh Smith visits the CCHQ Live stage to talk about voicing everything from video game to cartoons and more.

8.title: Comic-Con Insiders 3
8.plot: CCHQ insiders talk to Steve about their experiences at this year's con and the ultra popular, Pokemon Go.

9.title: Timeless
9.plot: The cast and creators of "Timeless" talk about their new series and if time travel can or already does exist.

10.title: IMDb Trivia 3
10.plot: Josh and Steve are back with more IMDb trivia with with the audience members at CCHQ Live.

11.title: Blair Witch
11.plot: The writing and directing team of "The Woods" aka "Blair Witch" sit down with the original creators of the film and talk about the process of bringing Blair Witch back and keeping it a secret for the past 2 years.

12.title: Yvette Nicole Brown
12.plot: Yvette Nicole Brown talks to Allison and Steve about being a fan herself and moderating panels at Comic-Con.

13.title: Exploding Kittens
13.plot: The makers of the phenomenon Exploding Kittens game talk about Kickstarter and how the game got its name.

14.title: Avengers Infinity War
14.plot: The writing team behind "Captain America: Civil War" and the upcoming "Avengers: Infinity War" Parts 1 and 2 talk about how they became a writing team.

15.title: Man of Action Studios
15.plot: The team from Man of Action Studios talks about their Comic-Con announcement of Ben 10 and what inspired them to work in this medium.

16.title: The Originals
16.plot: The beautiful cast of "The Originals" talks about panels at the con, immortality and Steve's Jigglypuff.

17.title: Final Fantasy XV
17.plot: The cast and creators of "Kingsglaive: Final Fantasy XV" discuss what is happening in the kingdom.

18.title: Grimm
18.plot: The cast of NBC's "Grimm" talks about handling fairy tales and what is coming up on season 6.

19.title: Injustice Gods Among us
19.plot: Ed Boon talks with Allison and Steve about character additions to the game.

20.title: Robert Picardo
20.plot: The most famous hologram from TV, The Doctor (Robert Picardo) talks about "Star Trek", the panel he is hosting and his love of science.

21.title: The Last Ship
21.plot: "It's like WALL-E with less Christmas lights."- Allison Haislip.

22.title: DC Comics Dan Jurgens
22.plot: Iconic DC Comics writer/artist/creator Dan Jurgens speaks about working on "Superman" and what story lines really stand out.

23.title: Walking Dead - Ross Marquad
23.plot: First time Comic-Con attendee and "The Walking Dead" actor, Ross Marquad discusses the panel experience and interacting with the fans.

24.title: Lego
24.plot: The most interactive booth on the con floor, Lego has something for everyone including master builders creating pieces right on the floor.

25.title: Weta Workshop
25.plot: Weta Workshop's makeup artist, Warren Dion Smith creates an Orc in just 30 minutes.

26.title: Alex Ross Booth
26.plot: Adam Sessler visits the Alex Ross Booth on Artists' Alley and check in with what purchases fans are making.

27.title: Ninja Turtles Interview
27.plot: Trisha meets up with some of the voices and creators behind the new iteration of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

28.title: The Strain
28.plot: Carrie Keagan checks in with the cast and creators of "The Strain" and tries to get some insider info on what is to come in the new season.

29.title: Jim Davis
29.plot: Rob and Rich meet the creator of "Garfield" and how he became a household name.

30.title: Marvel's Luke Cage
30.plot: Carrie gets the scoop on "Luke Cage", the character, the music and the iconic backdrop.

31.title: Lego Dimensions
31.plot: Lego Dimensions directors give Adam Sessler the info on the updates with the game including 16 new properties.

32.title: South Park
32.plot: Anthony Carboni checks out the massive 20th anniversary celebration of "South Park" that commemorate 20 iconic moments from the show.

33.title: Indie Comics
33.plot: SPOILER ALERT. Anthony talks to the president of Archie Comics about the pilot screening of "Riverdale". James Lucas Jones gives the scoop on the "Rick and Morty" spinoff comic.

34.title: Transformers Earth Wars
34.plot: Adam visits the Hasbro booth to check out the new "Transformers" strategy game.

35.title: Artists' Alley with Richard Friend
35.plot: Comic inker Richard Friend takes Adam through the process from pencil to ink.

36.title: Artists' Alley with Ken Penders
36.plot: Ken Penders talks to Adam about taking his comics digital that include audio tracks.

37.title: Artists' Alley with Jeff Martinez
37.plot: Jeff Martinez walks Adam through his mixing of genres.

38.title: Artists' Alley with Chris Brandt
38.plot: Chris Brandt created a cool comic based on Primus as an unofficial biography.

39.title: Artists' Alley with Anthony Washington
39.plot: Artist Anthony Washington talks to Adam about his creation of He-Man and Battle Cat.

41.title: Rick and Morty
41.plot: Adam Sessler interviews the team behind one of Cartoon Network's magical hit show, "Rick and Morty."

42.title: The 100
42.plot: Carrie Keagan speaks with the cast of CW's "The 100" about the end of season 3 and how the fans can have an effect on the writers.

43.title: Bates Motel
43.plot: "The Bates Motel" cast talks about fan reaction to Norma's death and the last season.

44.title: Bob's Burgers at Toddland
44.plot: Anthony Carboni talks to the creator of "Bob's Burgers" about the success of the series and checks out all the merchandise in the Toddland booth.

45.title: Rare and Unusual Comics
45.plot: Adam Sessler gets a look at rare and collectible pieces from Frank Darabont's personal collection for sale at the con.

46.title: Troma
46.plot: Trisha visits the Troma booth and meets with Kansas Bowling, who directed her first feature film at 17 years old with the guidance of the legendary Lloyd Kaufman.

47.title: Nintendo Family Lounge
47.plot: Rob and Rich visit the Play Nintendo Family Lounge to check out the newest Pokemon game and get the full interactive experience.

48.title: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
48.plot: The cast and crew of ABC's "Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D." talk about the announcement of Ghost Rider coming to the show.

49.title: Archer
49.plot: Anthony Carboni talks to the cast of "Archer" and asks them what their favorite quotable lines are from the series.

50.title: Mondo
50.plot: Anthony Carboni visits the Mondo booth to check out this year's exclusives including a Castlevania vinyl.

51.title: Powerless
51.plot: Carrie Keagan talks to the cast of NBC's "Powerless" and finds out about what its like to live as a real human in the DC universe.

52.title: Call of Duty Zombies
52.plot: The creators of Call of Duty Zombies bring fans a new way to experience the story; in the pages of a comic book.

53.title: TBS Booth
53.plot: Adam visits the TBS booth to get a look at a VR version of Conan O'Brien and learn about their new alien series, "People of Earth."

54.title: ABC Booth
54.plot: Rob and Rich visit the ABC Booth to experience their new series starring Kiefer Sutherland; "Designated Survivor."

55.title: End of Day 3
55.plot: CCHQ wraps up Day 3 of Comic-Con with a look at all the amazing experiences and people.

56.title: American Gods
56.plot: The cast and creators of "American Gods" join Carrie on the balcony to talk about the fan reaction to their show's trailer and seeing it themselves for the first time.

imdb.plot outline: Comic-Con HQ is live from San Diego Comic-Con International 2016. Alison Haislip, Steve Zaragoza and your favorite Comic-Con HQ personalities will cover the action around town. Get ready to talk comics, film, gaming, costumes, and pop culture.
imdb.title: San Diego Comic-Con 2016
plot: Comic-Con HQ is live from San Diego Comic-Con International 2016. Alison Haislip, Steve Zaragoza and your favorite Comic-Con HQ personalities will cover the action around town. Get ready to talk comics, film, gaming, costumes, and pop culture.
